top_categories.workout_context: Glengarry Games Gravel Run rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Glengarry Games Gravel Run’s ontario rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Glengarry Games Gravel Run’s ontario rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Glengarry Games Gravel Run. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Glengarry Games Gravel Run when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Racing Glengarry Games Gravel Run isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Every session at Glengarry Games Gravel Run intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Glengarry Games Gravel Run’s ontario rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Glengarry Games Gravel Run — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Glengarry Games Gravel Run — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
The varied gradients at Glengarry Games Gravel Run reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
High-volume endurance builds the aerobic base that makes Glengarry Games Gravel Run’s race-day efforts sustainable rather than destructive.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Glengarry Games Gravel Run’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Glengarry Games Gravel Run requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on ontario rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: ontario rolling, local event, canadian gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Durability to prepare you for 50 miles of ontario rolling gravel in Maxville, Ontario, Canada.
